amendment.description: An amendment numbered 83 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to prohibit funds to the Bureau of Land Management's proposed rule regarding the National Petroleum Reserve in Alaska.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Clyde amendment (A035) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Clyde amendment (A035) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Clyde amendment (A035) Agreed to by voice vote.
